Package com.intellij.ide.projectView

Interface ViewSettings

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NodeOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectViewSettings
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProjectTreeStructure, FavoritesTreeStructure, FavoritesViewSettings, ProjectTreeStructure, ProjectViewSettings.Delegate, ProjectViewSettings.Immutable, ViewSettings.Immutable

    public interface ViewSettings
extends NodeOptions
    The view settings for the project view.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static ViewSettings DEFAULT
      The default view settings for the project view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods

      default boolean isFlattenModules() 
      default boolean isFoldersAlwaysOnTop() 
      default boolean isShowMembers()
      Checks if the project view displays members of classes.
      default boolean isShowModules()
      Checks if modules are shown on the "Packages" tab of the project view.

      Checks if the project view displays URL for projects, modules and libraries.

        isAbbreviatePackageNames, isCompactDirectories, isFlattenPackages, isHideEmptyMiddlePackages, isShowLibraryContents

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final ViewSettings DEFAULT
        The default view settings for the project view.

    • Method Detail

      • isFoldersAlwaysOnTop

        default boolean isFoldersAlwaysOnTop()
        Returns:
        true if directories (folders or packages) should be separated from files, false otherwise.

      • isShowMembers

        default boolean isShowMembers()
        Checks if the project view displays members of classes.
        Returns:
        true if class members are displayed, false otherwise.

      • isStructureView

        default boolean isStructureView()
        Checks if the project view displays the structure view pane.
        Returns:
        true if the structure view is displayed, false otherwise.

      • isShowModules

        default boolean isShowModules()
        Checks if modules are shown on the "Packages" tab of the project view.
        Returns:
        true if the modules are shown, false otherwise.

      • isFlattenModules

        default boolean isFlattenModules()
        Returns:
        true if modules should be shown in a flat list without grouping accordingly to qualified names

      • isShowURL

        default boolean isShowURL()
        Checks if the project view displays URL for projects, modules and libraries.
        Returns:
        true if URL is displayed, false otherwise.
